resources.string:
The game is place specific to Malmö Universitys building "Niagara".

The concept includes the use of second screens, where the game is displayed on a public screen while the players play the game on their smartphones.

How to play

• Each game will last for 60 seconds.

• The player can either choose to be a painter or a guesser.

• As a painter, the player will get a word to draw.

• As soon as the painter has begun drawing, the guessers can start guessing.

• The guessers can also communicate with each other in the chat during the game.

About
This is a university project by Malmö Högskola.
For more information visit
https://github.com/TimFra/IDKProject_MID2_PFID3.


Credits
Thanks to Ossama Alami who shared https://github.com/firebase/AndroidChat.
Thanks to Jenny Tong who shared her https://github.com/firebase/AndroidDrawing.
